subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Vincent Kompany is the leader of the Belgium squad that will face the United States on Tuesday, and while he is one of the world’s top central defenders, he is also injury-prone.
snippet: Vincent Kompany is the leader of the Belgium squad that will face the United States on Tuesday, and while he is one of the world’s top central defenders, he is also injury-prone.
